casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ernest Raysean GRAY 364P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Ann B. Petersen, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Gray, Ernest Raysean. Kenneth A. Sack, Assistant Attorney General, Ashish K. Sharda, Assistant Attorney General, Jon David, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

James R. Glover, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of October 2018 by State of NC:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
